title: Machine Learning Apps
text: On the following pages Iâ€™m demonstrating several machine learing apps. Models are built with Jupyter notebooks using the Fastai library. The web interface is generated with Gradio and apps hosted on huggingface spaces. Finally, websites are generated using Quarto.

title: Image Classifier
text: Here we demonstrate an image classifier for flowers based on a Kaggle flower dataset The app is hosted on hugging face and embedded in this website.
